intro: Hey there! I'm Yugabharathi J, but you can call me SPiceZ.
paragraphs: I'm a Computer Science student who loves building things that live on the internet. When I'm not debugging code at 3 AM, you'll find me designing graphics for clients or competing in hackathons.
I believe in learning by doing, breaking things to understand them, and that the best code is written with good coffee and great music.
